Articles.Content: What is a good mod for switching between ships without having to go through the spaceport or the map screen? I had something before I took a brief sabbatical from gaming, but Squad had the audacity to update KSP (more so me not setting steam to not updated ) but now can't seem to recall which mod it was... PLEASE HELP!
You're probably looking for Haystack (continued). Or, for Targetron (but that is currently not updated to 0.24.2).
targetron was it, i'll give haystack a try. thanks
Targetron has an unofficial update later in the thread, which works fine in 0.24.2.
